  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085918</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Blogging: an introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blogging: eine Einleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Blogging : une introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Blogging: uma introdução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Blogging: un'introduzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Blogging: μια εισαγωγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Blogging: una introducción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Weblogs, or "blogs" for short, have many uses in education, as tools for publication, research, administration, and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weblogs oder "blogs" für Kurzschluß, haben viel 
Gebrauch in der Ausbildung, als Hilfsmittel für Publikation, 
Forschung, Leitung und mehr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Weblogs, ou "blogs" pour le short, ont beaucoup 
d'utilisations dans l'éducation, comme outils pour la publication, la
recherche, la gestion, et plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Weblogs, ou os "blogs" para o short, têm muitos 
usos na instrução, como ferramentas para a publicação, a pesquisa,
a administração, e o mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Weblogs, o "i blogs" in breve, ha molti usi nella 
formazione, come strumenti per la pubblicazione, la ricerca, la 
gestione e più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Weblogs, ή "blogs" για απότομα, έχει πολλές 
χρήσεις στην εκπαίδευση, ως εργαλεία για τη δημοσίευση, την 
έρευνα, τη διοίκηση, και περισσότερους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Weblogs, o los "blogs" para el cortocircuito, 
tiene muchas aplicaciones en la educación, como herramientas para la 
publicación, la investigación, la administración, y más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
